entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
